issue.title: [CF 234] Unit Cooldown does not reset upon entering arena
issue.body:
I track different enemy cooldowns on arena1-3 ( which works really great with the new cooldownlength enhancement you put in, thanks alot), but if i face the same team twice in a short time the cooldowntracker won´t reset. it doesn´t reset the cooldowns of tracked units upon entering the arena (perhaps you don´t know this: if you enter an arena match, all your spells reset their cooldowns in order to have everything ready when the match starts)

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. use the unit cooldown feature tracking cooldowns of arenaenemys.
2. face a team twice within a short period of time (shorter than the length of the tracked cooldown)
3. cooldowns won´t reset, tmw counts down the normal cooldown lenght, but entering the arena resets all cooldown once

german wow client, tmw 4.4.0


> Posted by CurseForge user Rhyn23 | Imported from CurseForge issue #234 | Raw
